snippet: Kaisa Group also said that it urgently needs to restructure its borrowings in order for a proposed rescue deal by Sunac China Holdings to proceed.
abstract: Chinese developer Kaisa Group says debts exceed $10 billion and company must restructure if rescue bid by Sunac China Holdings is to go forward.
lead_paragraph: Kaisa Group also said that it urgently needs to restructure its borrowings in order for a proposed rescue deal by Sunac China Holdings to proceed.

headline.main: Troubled Chinese Property Developer Says Total Debt Exceeds $10 Billion
headline.print_headline: Debt of Chinese Developer Climbs Even Higher
